content:
HttpRequestBase Class

Definition

Serves as the base class for classes that enable ASP.NET to read the HTTP values sent by a client during a Web request.

In this Article

public abstract class HttpRequestBase
Inheritance
System.Object
HttpRequestBase

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

The HttpRequestBase class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the HttpRequest class. The HttpRequestBase class enables you to create derived classes that are like the HttpRequest class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members that have customized behavior that fulfills the scenario that you are testing.

The HttpRequestWrapper class derives from the HttpRequestBase class. The HttpRequestWrapper class serves as a wrapper for the HttpRequest class. At run time, you typically use an instance of the HttpRequestWrapper class to invoke members of the HttpRequest object.

Constructors

HttpRequestBase()

Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance. This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

protected HttpRequestBase ();

Properties

AcceptTypes

When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of client-supported MIME accept types.

public virtual string[] AcceptTypes { get; }
Value
String[]

An array of client-supported MIME accept types.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

AnonymousID

When overridden in a derived class, gets the anonymous identifier for the user, if it is available.

public virtual string AnonymousID { get; }
Value
String

The current anonymous user identifier.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

ApplicationPath

When overridden in a derived class, gets the virtual root path of the ASP.NET application on the server.

public virtual string ApplicationPath { get; }
Value
String

The virtual path of the current application.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

AppRelativeCurrentExecutionFilePath

When overridden in a derived class, gets the virtual path of the application root and makes it relative by using the tilde (~) notation for the application root (as in "~/page.aspx").

public virtual string AppRelativeCurrentExecutionFilePath { get; }
Value
String

The virtual path of the application root for the current request with the tilde operator (~) added.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Browser

When overridden in a derived class, gets information about the requesting client's browser capabilities.

public virtual System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase Browser { get; }
Value
HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase

An object that represents the capabilities of the client browser.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

ClientCertificate

When overridden in a derived class, gets the current request's client security certificate.

public virtual System.Web.HttpClientCertificate ClientCertificate { get; }
Value
HttpClientCertificate

The client's security certificate.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

ContentEncoding

When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the character set of the data that is provided by the client.

public virtual System.Text.Encoding ContentEncoding { get; set; }

Encoding

The client's character set.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

ContentLength

When overridden in a derived class, gets the length, in bytes, of content that was sent by the client.

public virtual int ContentLength { get; }
Value
Int32

The length, in bytes, of content that was sent by the client.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

ContentType

When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the MIME content type of the request.

public virtual string ContentType { get; set; }
Value
String

The MIME content type of the request, such as "text/html".

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Cookies

When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of cookies that were sent by the client.

public virtual System.Web.HttpCookieCollection Cookies { get; }
Value
HttpCookieCollection

The client's cookies.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

CurrentExecutionFilePath

When overridden in a derived class, gets the virtual path of the current request.

public virtual string CurrentExecutionFilePath { get; }
Value
String

The virtual path of the page handler that is currently executing.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Remarks

The CurrentExecutionFilePath property returns the file path of the currently executing page handler.

When you redirect a request using either the Execute method or the Transfer method, the CurrentExecutionFilePath property returns the path of the page that you are redirecting to (the child page). However, when the client is redirected to another page, the FilePath property returns the path to the original page.

FilePath

When overridden in a derived class, gets the virtual path of the current request.

public virtual string FilePath { get; }
Value
String

The virtual path of the current request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Files

When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of files that were uploaded by the client, in multipart MIME format.

public virtual System.Web.HttpFileCollectionBase Files { get; }
Value
HttpFileCollectionBase

The files that were uploaded by the client. The items in the HttpFileCollection object are of type HttpPostedFile.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Filter

When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the filter to use when the current input stream is being read.

public virtual System.IO.Stream Filter { get; set; }
Value
Stream

An object to use as the filter.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Form

When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of form variables that were sent by the client.

public virtual System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection Form { get; }
Value
NameValueCollection

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of HTTP headers that were sent by the client.

public virtual System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection Headers { get; }
Value
NameValueCollection

The request headers.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the HTTP data-transfer method (such as GET, POST, or HEAD) that was used by the client.

public virtual string HttpMethod { get; }
Value
String

The HTTP data-transfer method that was used by the client.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the contents of the incoming HTTP entity body.

Value
Stream

The contents of the incoming HTTP entity body.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

IsAuthenticated

When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the request has been authenticated.

public virtual bool IsAuthenticated { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the request has been authenticated; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the request is from the local computer.

Value
Boolean

true if the request is from the local computer; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

IsSecureConnection

When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the HTTP connection uses secure sockets (HTTPS protocol).

public virtual bool IsSecureConnection { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the connection is an SSL connection that uses HTTPS protocol; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Item(String)

When overridden in a derived class, gets the specified object from the stem.Web.HttpRequestBase.Cookies*, stem.Web.HttpRequestBase.Form*, stem.Web.HttpRequestBase.QueryString*, or stem.Web.HttpRequestBase.ServerVariables* collections.

public virtual string this[string key] { get; }
key
String

The name of the collection member to get.

Value
String

The stem.Web.HttpRequestBase.QueryString*, stem.Web.HttpRequestBase.Form*, stem.Web.HttpRequestBase.Cookies*, or stem.Web.HttpRequestBase.ServerVariables* collection member that is specified by key. If the specified key value is not found, null is returned.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

LogonUserIdentity

When overridden in a derived class, gets the WindowsIdentity type for the current user.

public virtual System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity LogonUserIdentity { get; }
Value
WindowsIdentity

The identity for the current user.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Params

When overridden in a derived class, gets a combined collection of stem.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString*, stem.Web.HttpRequest.Form*, stem.Web.HttpRequest.ServerVariables*, and stem.Web.HttpRequest.Cookies* items.

public virtual System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection Params { get; }
Value
NameValueCollection

The collection of combined values.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Path

When overridden in a derived class, gets the virtual path of the current request.

public virtual string Path { get; }
Value
String

The virtual path of the current request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

PathInfo

When overridden in a derived class, gets additional path information for a resource that has a URL extension.

public virtual string PathInfo { get; }
Value
String

The additional path information for the resource.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Remarks

For the URL Http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html/tail, the PathInfo value is /tail.

PhysicalApplicationPath

When overridden in a derived class, gets the physical file-system path of the current application's root directory.

public virtual string PhysicalApplicationPath { get; }
Value
String

The file-system path of the current application's root directory.

NotImplementedException

Always.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the physical file-system path of the requested resource.

public virtual string PhysicalPath { get; }
Value
String

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of HTTP query-string variables.

public virtual System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection QueryString { get; }
Value
NameValueCollection

The query-string variables that were sent by the client in the URL of the current request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the complete URL of the current request.

public virtual string RawUrl { get; }

String

The complete URL of the current request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

RequestType

When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the HTTP data-transfer method (GET or POST) that was used by the client.

public virtual string RequestType { get; set; }
Value
String

The HTTP data-transfer method type that was used by the client.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of Web server variables.

public virtual System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection ServerVariables { get; }
Value
NameValueCollection

The server variables.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

TotalBytes

When overridden in a derived class, gets the number of bytes in the current input stream.

public virtual int TotalBytes { get; }
Value
Int32

The number of bytes in the input stream.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Url

When overridden in a derived class, gets information about the URL of the current request.

public virtual Uri Url { get; }
Value
Uri

An object that contains information about the URL of the current request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

UrlReferrer

When overridden in a derived class, gets information about the URL of the client request that linked to the current URL.

public virtual Uri UrlReferrer { get; }
Value
Uri

The URL of the page that linked to the current request.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

UserAgent

When overridden in a derived class, gets the complete user-agent string of the client.

public virtual string UserAgent { get; }
Value
String

The complete user-agent string of the client.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

UserHostAddress

When overridden in a derived class, gets the IP host address of the client.

public virtual string UserHostAddress { get; }
Value
String

The IP address of the client.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

UserHostName

When overridden in a derived class, gets the DNS name of the client.

public virtual string UserHostName { get; }
Value
String

The DNS name of the client.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

UserLanguages

When overridden in a derived class, gets a sorted array of client language preferences.

public virtual string[] UserLanguages { get; }
Value
String[]

A sorted array of client language preferences, or null if the array is empty.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Methods

BinaryRead(Int32)

When overridden in a derived class, performs a binary read of a specified number of bytes from the current input stream.

public virtual byte[] BinaryRead (int count);
count
Int32

The number of bytes to read.

Returns
Byte[]

An array that contains the binary data.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

MapImageCoordinates(String)

When overridden in a derived class, maps an incoming image-field form parameter to appropriate x-coordinate and y-coordinate values.

public virtual int[] MapImageCoordinates (string imageFieldName);
imageFieldName
String

The name of the image map.

Returns
Int32[]

A two-dimensional array of integers.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

MapPath(String)

When overridden in a derived class, maps the specified virtual path to a physical path on the server.

public virtual string MapPath (string virtualPath);
virtualPath
String

The virtual path (absolute or relative) to map to a physical path.

Returns
String

The physical path on the server that is specified by virtualPath.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

MapPath(String,String,Boolean)

When overridden in a derived class, maps the specified virtual path to a physical path on the server.

public virtual string MapPath (string virtualPath, string baseVirtualDir, bool allowCrossAppMapping);
virtualPath
String

The virtual path (absolute or relative) to map to a physical path.

baseVirtualDir
String

The virtual base directory path that is used for relative resolution.

allowCrossAppMapping
Boolean

true to indicate that virtualPath can belong to another application; otherwise, false.

Returns
String

The physical path on the server.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

SaveAs(String,Boolean)

When overridden in a derived class, saves an HTTP request to disk.

public virtual void SaveAs (string filename, bool includeHeaders);
filename
String

The physical drive path.

includeHeaders
Boolean

A value that specifies whether to save HTTP headers to disk.

Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

ValidateInput()

When overridden in a derived class, causes validation to occur for the collections that are accessed through the stem.Web.HttpRequestBase.Cookies*, stem.Web.HttpRequestBase.Form*, and stem.Web.HttpRequestBase.QueryString* properties.

public virtual void ValidateInput ();
Exceptions
NotImplementedException

Always.

Remarks

The HttpRequestBase class uses input validation flags to determine whether to perform validation on the request collections that are accessed through the Cookies, Form, and QueryString properties. The ValidateInput method sets these flags so that when the get accessors of the Cookies, Form, or QueryString properties are invoked, input validation is performed. Validation works by checking all input data against a hard-coded list of potentially dangerous data.
